casebody.data:
A. L. HAMMOCK, Appellant, v. A. C. ADERHOLD, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Atlanta, Georgia, Appellee. No. 6242. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Oct. 21, 1931. Clint W. Hager, U. S. Atty., and Hal Lindsay, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of Atlanta, Ga., for appellee.

Before BRYAN, SIBLEY, and WALKER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
